title: The Case of a Salaryman Who Was Reincarnated Into an Otome Game ~I Have a Wife, so I’m Going Back to the Real World~ - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Magic   Male Protagonist   Mob Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Otome Game   Transmigration
author: 琥珀 あひる
description:
One morning, I woke up to find myself in the world of an otome game.

I've been a company employee for twenty-five years, and I'm an alpha male with a family, but suddenly I've become a merchant boy named Glen Alford.

So this is the otherworldly reincarnation I heard about. But I don't remember dying at all!

The world I've arrived in is the otome game 'Eleanore! 

In order to find a clue to return home, I entered the game's stage, 'Royal Sarun Afia Academy,' but I'm not even a mob, I'm 'less than a mob'. I don't care what it takes, I want to see my wife. I don't have a single reason to stay in this world.

No matter who, what, or how they say, I'm going back to my own world!

This is the story of a forty-seven-year-old salaryman who set out to return from the game world to the real world.>
